verses.verseString: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verses.verseStringReplacedWithAllah: In the name of Allah, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: By the night as it covers.
And by the day, as it reveals.
And by He who created the male and the female.
Surely, your endeavors are diverse.
As for the one who gives and is righteous.
And who affirms the ultimate goodness.
We will pave for him the path of ease.
But as for he who is stingy and indifferent.
And denies the ultimate goodness.
We will pave for him the path of hardship.
And his wealth won’t avail him when he plummets.
It’s upon Us to guide.
And to Us belong the Last and the First.
I have warned you of a blazing Fire.
None will burn in it except the wicked.
He who denies and turns away.
But the righteous will avoid it.
He who gives of what he has, purifying himself.
Not expecting to be repaid by anyone.
Solely seeking the countenance of his Lord, the Most High.
And he will be satisfied.
